name: setlist-builder-sync
description: A comprehensive web application for musicians to create, share, and synchronize setlists across devices and band members.

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.deploy: cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run start:prod
scripts.test: concurrently "cd server && npm test" "cd client && npm test"

author: Setlist Builder Team
